public abstract class StandardWorker
extends Object

A standard worker implementation which provides logic for signalling when a worker has ended.

Method Detail

isEnded

public boolean isEnded()
Description copied from interface: Worker
Checks to see if a worker is finished and can no longer iterate. Most subclasses can always return true as they will end automatically when they try to pull from an input buffer and get an BufferEndedException. This should only be needed for something like a source which has realized that its native input has run dry. For example, the DirectoryScanner signals this when there are no more files that it can process.

Specified by:
isEnded in interface Worker
